snippet.title: HAUNTED PS1 DEMO DISC 2021 - tmOD by tm - Full Demo (No Commentary) Retro Horror half life gMOD
snippet.description:
Haunted PS1 Demo Disc 2021
tmOD by tm
https://hauntedps1.itch.io/demodisc2021
https://tobyme.itch.io/tmod
https://tobyme.itch.io/
https://twitter.com/TobymDev

Welcome to the world of tmOD, your world. For the first time ever, the personal computer owner can now rejoice in the polygonal heaven that is tmOD, where you decide what the rules are, and whatever fantasy is wroght, will be granted a life of its own. 

Modern Horror Gaming : "I will be the first to admit that I am not the right audience of Garry's Mod. I lack the creativity to make an enjoyable experience out of sandbox games. I enjoy a nice linear walk through the park, but tmOD isn't just a garry's mod clone. There is something really eerie and weird about the entire thing and I love that. Interesting to see what ends up happening in this old sandbox."
